job description:
Description:
  • Contribute to the discovery and development of life-saving medicines for cancer patients.
    • SKILLS Qualifications:
  • BS or MS in biological sciences.
  • 4 years hands-on experience in mouse models: injection (i.p., i.v. and s.c.), oral gavage, tumor implantation, tumor caliper measurement, organ isolation.
  • Attention to details and be ability to conduct experiments accurately.
  • Excellent organization and communication skills and dedicated work ethic.
    • Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience in immune cell isolation from blood and tumor; cell culture and cell-based functional assays with immune cells.
  • Hands-on experience in mouse tissue processing and antibody staining for FACS, running and analyzing FACS data.
  • ELISA; DNA/RNA isolation.
  • Prior experience in the fields of immuno-oncology, cancer biology or immunology.
    • Synectics is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
